titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: CHYLE LEAK SEVERITY TYPE - Description

div.p: The Chyle leak (sequela of head and neck surgery where the thoracic duct is injured) severity type during an Upper Gastrointestinal Cancer Care Spell.
CHYLE LEAK SEVERITY TYPE is required where the INTERNATIONAL ESOPHAGEAL DATABASE SURGICAL COMPLICATIONS National Code is 'Chyle leak severity/type'.
